subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Happy New Year All

full_text:

Happy New Year!

Debbie Tejada <debbie@...> wrote:          Just wanted to say Happy New Year to the group; I'm so glad to have
found this forum and the intelligent and contemplative people that
frequent it!

I've been listening to recordings I took at my first private home
investigation last week, and had my first bona fide EVP today. I've
heard things in person, but this is the first time I actually had it
recorded and I'm psyched -- I think this next year is going to be a
doozie!

I'll post it once I've had a chance to isolate it in Audacity and
listen a few times. Anyway ~ 

Happy New Year and much progress & success in this next year!



                         



 



       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
